text: 40|37|asamane arohanera abalambana, yena dekhate pa'i musara ilahake; ara niscaya ami take mithyabadi mane kari.' Ara ebhabe phira'a'unera kache sobhaniya kara hayechila tara manda kajake ebam take nibrtta kara hayechila sarala patha theke ebam phira'a'unera sarayantra kebala byartha'i chila.
